頤.definition: (literary) chin; jaw; (literary) to foster; to nurture; to protect

頤性養壽.definition: to take care of one's spirit and keep fit (idiom)

頤指.definition: to order with the chin; to indicate what one wants by facial gesture

頤指氣使.definition: lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture; arrogant and bossy

頤指風使.definition: lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture; arrogant and bossy

頤養.definition: to nourish; to nurture; to strengthen

頤養天年.definition: lit. to nurture one's years (idiom); fig. to enjoy one's later years
